About Echelon Foundry

Echelon Foundry is the consulting practice of Kevin Miller, a seasoned technology executive with over 25 years of experience transforming engineering organizations and aligning software systems with strategic goals. His cross-sector background spans finance, nonprofit, food systems, and consumer tech—each engagement grounded in deep technical insight and operational pragmatism.

Kevin has led architectural modernization efforts for platforms serving 17 of the top 20 financial institutions managing donor-advised funds, cut operational expenses by over $500,000 annually through vendor and process optimization, and reduced time-to-market from 6 weeks to just 2 days via delivery pipeline redesign.

In addition to hands-on architecture and engineering leadership, Kevin consults on agile transformation—including culture shift, process audits, and delivery acceleration—and provides financial analysis for investors, helping evaluate the technical and operational health of potential portfolio companies.

As a former Microsoft MVP, technical reviewer, public speaker, and educator, Kevin brings a unique blend of engineering depth, business fluency, and creative thinking. He’s also a trained chocolatier and former culinary competitor—applying the same precision and creativity from the kitchen to systems, code, and strategy.
